CustomField.description: ONLY USE FOR FIXED PRICE PROJECTS. Shows what the revenue would be for this Fixed Price project if it was a T&M project. (Suggested Bill Rate x Billable Hours Approved).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ONLY USE FOR FIXED PRICE PROJECTS. Shows what the revenue would be for this Fixed Price project if it was a T&M project. (Suggested Bill Rate x Billable Hours Approved).
CustomField.label: Fixed Price Revenue
